body.name: 2024 WiFi Extender Signal Booster for Home Powerful 6 Antennas WiFi Booster - up to 10000 sq.ft Coverage, 1200Mbps Dual Band 5GHz/2.4GHz Long Range Wireless Internet Booster WiFi Repeater
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 12 hrs 40 mins
features: 【Say GoodBye to WIFI Dead Zone & Free Ethernet Cable】The Zodthod Newest WiFi Extender Coverage up to 10000sq. ft with advanced 2-Core Central Processor and powerful bank-grade financial security smart chip can better extend wireless signals to hard-to-reach areas. Gifted with a 10-foot Ethernet cable.

【Powerful 6 Antennas & 1200Mbps Stable Signal】The internet booster WiFi repeater comes with dual band technology, provide up to 300Mbps for 2.4GHz, up to 866Mbps for 5Ghz, 360 degree high-speed connection and 6 external High-Gain antennas provide a powerful stable signal and greater penetration for happy Surfing HD video and online game.

【Highly Compatible with 45 Devices】Easily connect to any brands of router and access points. And The WiFi range extender support up to 45 devices such as smartphones, laptop, xbox/PS, garage doors, IoT and Alexa, IP cameras, Fire Stick TV and any WiFi supporting device.

【US WiFi Security Protocol】Zodthod WiFi boosters uses bank-grade financial security smart chip promotes the latest advanced WPA/WPA2 security protocol privacy features beyond its peers. Complies with FCC and IEEE802.11b/g/n standards. Protect your banking and personal data, it creates the ultimate strong security and defense wall for business and personal protection.

【Easy Set Up & 1-Year Warranty】Use the web browser on your smartphone/tablet /PC for settings. It is easy to set up according to the user manual, without complicated steps and techniques. You can also press the WPS button on the WiFi extender and router at the same time for a fast connection. Edtiske provides you with lifelong technical support and employ a 1-YEAR warranty policy to give you more peace of mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect solution for expanding your wifi network.
reviews.reviewText: I recently upgraded my home network with the 2024 WiFi Extender Signal Booster, and it has been an absolute game-changer. The six powerful antennas ensure that every corner of my house, spanning an impressive 10,000 square feet., receives strong and consistent WiFi signals. What impressed me most was the dual-band functionality, offering both 5GHz for high-speed demands and 2.4GHz for better range. The setup was a breeze, and I noticed an immediate improvement in my internet speed, reaching up to 1200Mbps.Streaming 4K videos and online gaming sessions are now seamless experiences, thanks to this extender. Its long-range capabilities mean I can enjoy a reliable connection in areas of my home where it was previously weak or nonexistent. The design is sleek and unobtrusive, blending perfectly with my home décor.One of the standout features is the ease of extending my existing network without any complicated configurations. The WiFi repeater function also ensures that there is no loss in signal quality, providing a stable and consistent internet experience throughout my home.In conclusion, the 2024 WiFi Extender Signal Booster is a must-have for anyone looking to enhance their home network. Its powerful performance, extensive coverage, and user-friendly setup make it an excellent investment for a modern, connected home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great wifi repeater!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this wall-plug WiFi repeater, and it has made a big difference for my home network. This compact device is incredibly easy to set up; all I had to do was plug it into a wall outlet and follow a simple setup process on my phone. The results have been impressive.Before installing the repeater, I had dead spots in my home where the WiFi signal was weak or non-existent. Streaming videos or even browsing the internet was a frustrating experience in those areas. However, since using this repeater, those dead spots have disappeared, and I now have a strong and stable WiFi connection throughout my house.The repeater has greatly improved my internet signal strength, and I no longer experience lag or buffering while streaming content. It has also improved the speed and reliability of my online gaming sessions.In addition to its performance, the repeater's sleek and compact design blends seamlessly with my home decor, and it doesn't take up any valuable floor space. It's the perfect solution for anyone looking to extend their WiFi coverage without the hassle of complicated installations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy set up, great value and visually attractive
reviews.reviewText: Our house has a concrete roof and calls were dropping from certain areas. I no longer have that issue of dropped calls. The signal is strong throughout the whole house now and I don’t need to go outside of the concrete roof area to prevent important calls from dropping . The instructions were easy to follow and got the setup completed within a few minutes. The device is small and actually looks very nice, not an eyesore. Would recommend due to its appearance, improved WiFi and cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Connecting app keeps crashing
reviews.reviewText: 2nd Update: just got the supposed replacement for the faulty one I initially got. I am running into the same issue as the original. The connection app is continuously crashing making it impossible to connect. I can’t recommend this product at all. I will be returning this product and be looking for another brand that will work.Update: Customer service has been very accommodating in trying to get the issue resolved. It seems to be a defect with the device and are sending a new one to make things right. I appreciate the customer service team for helping me with the situation.I just purchased this item, plugged it in to the outlet, and began the Repeater Mode installation method of connecting. I was able to identify the extender’s network on my phone’s Wi-Fi search (using the 5G network) and it initiated their connecting app. Started fine as I selected the Repeater mode. It then began the search for my home 5G network. Mid search, the connecting app crashes unexpectedly. I try to re-access the extender’s 5G network and my phone informs me that I am unable to connect to the network.I reached out to their customer service email just now so I will see what they have to say.I’ll edit this review after hearing back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The size of this produce is smaller than what I expected. However, it can satisfy my basic use and is easy to install. My router was installed in my basement, which weakens the signal in my garage. I put it in my kitchen, that gives the garage a lot more signal. I can also get the signal in my backyard now. I am happy to own it, which gives me stable Wifi throughout the house inside and outside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great coverage and easy to install
reviews.reviewText: I needed a strong repeater that can extend our wifi signals through concrete walls ay work and this one does the job. Now we have signal in other rooms where we normally would either get buffering or just dropped connection altogether. Another good thing I liked is that there are no wires! Just plug it into an outlet and set it up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This works really well!
reviews.reviewText: Our bedroom doesn’t get good wifi signal so we bought this hoping it would help. It did! That paired with a newer firestick made all the glitches disappear! Set up was super easy!
